_description: A prayer to St. Helena — six lines in couplets

YorkMinXVIK6.Transcription:
Seint Elene I þe prayTo helpe me at my last dayTo sette
                    þe crosse & his passioneBe twix my synfull saule &
                    domeNow & in þe houre of my dedeAnd brynge my soule to
                    requied
